articles.title: Health Directive No. 17 loosening restrictions issued - Memphis Local, Sports, Business & Food News - The Daily Memphian
articles.description: Shelby County Health Department Directive No. 17 loosening restrictions issued. No businesses are specifically closed under the new directive, but some restrictions remain.
articles.content:
Beginning at 12:01 a.m. on Saturday, Jan. 23, COVID restrictions will loosen. Bars and restaurants will move from 25% to 50% capacity and museums and theaters will be allowed to reopen.
